CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
--[[
사용 x
local Users = _UserService.UserEntities local UserCount = Users.Count
while UserCount == 0 do wait(0.1) Users = _UserService.UserEntities UserCount = Users.Count end
log(UserCount)
local Index = 1
if UserCount == 1 then for Name, Entity in pairs(Users) do Entity.InitRole:SetRole("Hybrid") end else for Name, Entity in pairs(Users) do if Index == 1 then Entity.InitRole:SetRole("Builder") else Entity.InitRole:SetRole("Character") end Index = Index + 1 end end ]]
